mapper.select: select count(*) as nums from voteitem where vsid=#{vsid} and uid=#{uid}

select a.voteid,a.voteoption,ifnull(b.votecount,0) as votecount from (select vsid, voteid,voteoption from voteoption where vsid=#{vsid} ) a left join (select vsid,voteid,count(voteid) as votecount from voteitem where vsid=#{vsid} group by voteid )b on a.voteid=b.voteid
